headline: Arcos Dorados to Participate in Upcoming Investor Event

headline: The Dow Is Missing Out on the AMD Rally
summary: The blue-chip index, which weighs its members by stock price rather than market cap, fell sharply on a day when the Nasdaq and the S&P 500 were on track for record closing highs.  The Dow was down 266 points, or 0.6%.  Only 10 stocks in the index were rising, and some of its heaviest hitters—Sherwin-Williams, Home Depot, McDonald’s, and Salesforce—were big laggards.
